chapter.text: Apane palanahara de nama di pavitarata da varanana karo, jihara sabha tom sresata hai
Jisa ne paida kita phira savari'a
Jisa ne (samajha diti) thahira'i'a ate phira raha vikha'i'a
Phira usa nu kale raga da kura bana dita
Asim tuhanu parhavange, phira tusim nahim bhuloge
Paratu jo alaha cahe, uha janada hai, `gujhi'am vi ate pragata vi
Ate asim tuhanu saukhe raha te lai calange
Tam sikhi'a devem, jekara sikhi'a labha deve
Uha bada upadesa savikara karega jihara darada hai
Uha jihara abhaga hovega, usa tom muha morega
Uha na usa vica marega ate nam ji'unda rahega
Uha safala ho'i'a jisa ne apane apa nu pavitara kita
Ate apane raba da nama li'a, phira namaza parhi
Sagom tusim dhuni'avi jivana nu ahami'ata dide ho
Ate praloka bihatara hai ate satha'i hai
Iha pahile sahifi'am (gratham? Vica vi hai)
Musa ate ibarahima de sahifi'am vica
